code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with progressive Heart for past 8 days. she is a 28 YO F. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol patient reports that she smokes once or twice daily o:Height 176 cm, Weight 91 kg, Temperature 36.5 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15, Skin = cold clammy extremities a:Bradycardia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed atropine - 1 mg IV every 5 minutes as needed for symptomatic bradyarrhythmia, and ordered ECG.

td.content: s:patient presents with progressive Heart for past 6 days. she is a female toolmaker aged 29 Ys. o:Height 176 cm, Weight 93.3 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, Skin = cold clammy extremities a:Bradycardia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed atropine - 1 mg IV every 5 minutes as needed for symptomatic bradyarrhythmia, and ordered ECG.
